description: Tile shower floor installation tips…all the trowel notches are parallel. This allows air to escape and the mortar to collapse. I also applied mortar to the back of the tile - 95% of the tile should be covered in mortar. The spacers give me even grout joints and an expansion joint at the shower walls 👍🏽🔥#tile #tileshower #bathroomremodel
title: Tile Shower Floor Installation Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
